site_name: Flat 112A, Flat 112B And Flat 3, 112 Lordship Lane.LondonSouthwarkSE22 8HF
description: Details of Condition 3 - an Arboricultural Method Statement as required by planning permission dated 08/03/2022 [LBS Ref 22/AP/0127] for 'Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of planning pemission 19/AP/0095 dated 24/04/2019 for 'Construction of rear ground and first floor extension, and second floor extension for new 1 bed flat with pitched roof and 3 dormer windows in rear elevation. Bin storage to front of property and cycle storage at the rear' to replace a consented velux window in the front elevation with a dormer window, and to raise the height of the roof to the new flat at second floor level'.
